dirt_bike_assassin.name: Dirt-Bike Assassin
dirt_bike_assassin.description: A highly mobile assassin mounted on a dirt bike.

cult_war_leader.name: Cult War Leader
cult_war_leader.description: A mutated being carrying a cult icon.

snatcher_lord.name: Soul Stealer Lord
snatcher_lord.description: A massive mutant with psychic powers

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: An uplifted human with psychic powers.

acolyte_icon_bearer.name: Acolyte Icon Bearer
acolyte_icon_bearer.description: A mutated being carrying a cult icon.

cult_strategist.name: Cult Strategist
cult_strategist.description: A cult specialist who rallies the hordes of troops.

cult_proclamator.name: Cult Proclamator
cult_proclamator.description: A cult specialist who rallies the hordes of troops.

pure_soul_snatchers.name: Pure Soul Stealers
pure_soul_snatchers.description: Barely recognizable mutants of other species

neophytes.name: Neophytes
neophytes.description: A group of miners and other manual laborers who have revolted and turned to the cult.

acolytes.name: Acolytes
acolytes.description: A disfigured squad of humans turned to the cult.

metamorphs.name: Metamorphs
metamorphs.description: Half alien and half human, these hybrids are the last step before becoming fully alien.

abominations.name: Abominations
abominations.description: Mutated with super strength, these aliens will tear enemies to shreds.

defense_force_squad.name: Cult Defense Force Squad
defense_force_squad.description: A defense force squad turned to the cult.

heavy_weapon_squad.name: Cult Heavy Weapons Squad
heavy_weapon_squad.description: A squad of heavy weapons teams loaded out to deal with a variety of targets.

battle_tank.name: Cult Battle Tank
battle_tank.description: A main line battle tank stolen from the imperial defense force.

support_vehicle.name: Cult Support Vehicle
support_vehicle.description: A support vehicle with multiple roles from artillery to anti-air.

assault_vehicle.name: Cult Assault Vehicle
assault_vehicle.description: A light assault vehicle with multiple roles.

light_apc.name: Cult APC
light_apc.description: A light transport stolen from the imperial defense force.

scout_buggy.name: Scout Buggy
scout_buggy.description: A repurposed civilian or mining vehicle turned into a cult ambush wagon.

light_truck.name: Cult Truck
light_truck.description: A repurposed civilian or mining vehicle turned into a cult ambush wagon.

scout_walker.name: Cult Scout Walker
scout_walker.description: A lightly equipped recon walker stolen from the imperial defense force.

armored_walker.name: Cult Armored Walker
armored_walker.description: An armored light combat walker stolen from the imperial defense force.

light_gunship.name: Cult Light Transport Gunship
light_gunship.description: A light gunship with sliding doors for troop transport stolen from the imperial defense force.

mining_truck.name: Cult Mining Vehicle
mining_truck.description: A repurposed heavy mining vehicle turned into a cult heavy vehicle.

targeting_relay.name: Range-finder
targeting_relay.description: When this unit activates, choose an enemy unit within 36". The next friendly _Infantry_ unit to shoot that model may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+.

chosen_abomination.name: Chosen Abomination
chosen_abomination.description: Once per round, a friendly _Abominations_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

swarm_melee_tactics.name: Swarm Melee Tactics
swarm_melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

cult_icon.name: Cult Icon
cult_icon.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 Save when targeted by a Shooting or Fighting attack.

extra_armor.name: Reinforced Hull
extra_armor.description: Subtract 1 from all Damage Table(X) rolls for this model.

cult_tactics.name: Cult Mind Control Tactics
cult_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 24" to immediately activate and receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+ 
 * +1 Courage 
 * +3" of Movement

cult_melee_tactics.name: Cult Melee Tactics
cult_melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
strategist.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Brilliant Strategist.
strategist.flavor: This model has an adept strategic mind.

strategies.name: Ambush
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.
strategies.flavor: Alien Cults typically lie in wait for the best moment to strike from surprise.

strategies.name: Swarm Reflexes
strategies.description: Use when taking an initiative test. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: Mutated by the alien swarm, these humans gain super-human reflexes.

strategies.name: Devotion
strategies.description: Use after a _Leader_ unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack within 6" of a friendly _Infantry_ unit. For this attack, you can roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the _Infantry_ unit instead of the original target.
strategies.flavor: With unquestioning loyalty, cult members will throw themselves into the line of fire to protect their leaders.

strategies.name: Concealment
strategies.flavor: These cultists are so adept they can even in plain sight.
strategies.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

strategies.name: Forward Scout
strategies.description: Use when a unit arrives on the table. That unit gets +6" of Movement. This move may not be within 12" of any enemy units.
strategies.flavor: Forwards scouts ensure these cultists will arrive before the enemy.

strategies.name: Scramblers
strategies.description: Use after an _Infantry_ unit declares it is arriving from reserves within 24" of this unit. That unit automatically fails any Initiative tests for arriving on the table.
strategies.flavor: Prepared for any enemies, these scramblers will ensure no one can find our units.

strategies.name: Toughness
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.

strategies.name: Hit and Run
strategies.description: Use after one of your _Infantry_ or _Biker_ units performs a Shoot or Fight action. You may immediately take a free move action.
strategies.flavor: Hit and run tactics can sometimes be key to survival.

strategies.name: At All Costs
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit takes a Break test. That test is automatically passed.
strategies.flavor: These cultists are prepared to hold at all costs.

strategies.name: Zealous Assault
strategies.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for the charge action.
strategies.flavor: With righteous fury, these marines charge into battle.

strategies.name: Strike Down
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
strategies.flavor: These marines strike their foes down with a flurry of melee attacks.

strategies.name: Counter Attack
strategies.flavor: Not afraid of a fight, these cultists will Counter Attack upon their enemies.
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.

direct_control.name: Direct Control
direct_control.description: Target friendly unit within 24" may immediately activate, and use this model's Courage value until the end of the activation phase.

vitality.name: Vitality
vitality.description: Until the end of the activation phase, whenever target friendly unit within 18" takes a hit, roll a D10. On a result of 3 or less ignore that hit.

horror.name: Horror
horror.description: Target enemy unit within 24" suffers -1 Accuracy, -1 Strength, and -1 Courage until the end of the activation phase.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.description:
Target friendly unit within 18" gains one of the following effects until the end of the phase: 
 * The unit may make a free shoot action after it moves 
 * The unit may make a free Charge action after it moves

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits with AP 1.

bolt.name: Bolt
bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 2 hits with AP 5.
